甽字的基本解释

甽
zhèn
同“圳”。

甽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［quǎn］
［《廣韻》姑泫切，上銑，見。］
亦作“甽1”。亦作“1”。“1”的今字。
(1)田间小水沟。
(2)泛指沟渠、河流。
(3)山谷。
(4)指田野。
(5)疏通；流注。
(6)古族名。参见“畎夷”。

甽字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【田字部】　甽； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页759第09
【玉篇】古文畎字。【前漢·食貨志】后稷始甽田，以二耜爲耦，廣尺深尺曰甽。【後漢·章帝紀】毎尋前世舉人貢土，或起甽畝。　又【類篇】松倫切，音旬。山下受霤處。【釋名】山下根之受霤處曰甽。甽，吮也，吮得山之肥潤也。【呂氏春秋】丁田弃甽。　又【集韻】朱閏切，音稕。溝也。

考證：〔【玉篇】古文?字。〕　謹照原文?改畎。

Basic explanation of words
甽
zhèn

甽
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［quǎn］
["Guangyun" Gu Xun cut, milled up, see you. ]
Also known as "甽1". Also called "1". The present character of "1".
(1) Small water ditches in the field.
(2) Refers to ditches and rivers in general.
(3) Valley.
(4) Refers to the field.
(5) Dredge; stream notes.
(6) Ancient clan name. See "Nan Yi".
甽
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Tian Zi Department] 　甽; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: Page 759 09
[Jade articles] Ancient Chinese 畎字. [Previous Han·Shihuo Zhi] Hou Ji began to sang Tian, using two scorpions as the couple, wide and deep, called 甽. [Later Han·Zhang Diji] Every time you look for the tribute to the earth in the previous life, or build up acres.　[Classes] Songlun cut, sound Xun. Slip down the mountain. [Release name] The place where the root of the mountain is slipped is called 甽. Nie, suck it, suck the plump of the mountain. [Lu Shi Chun Qiu] Ding Tian Qizheng.　[Jiyun] Zhu Runqie, sound 稕. Ditch too. Textual research: [[Jade articles] Ancient Chinese? 〕 　 Would you like to follow the original text? Change it.
